productDescription: Black hooded sweater with a beige 'PHNX' in our PHOENIX font and a pouch pocket on the front. The hoodie is made of a heavy blend of 50% cotton and 50% polyester and has a classic fit. The sweater has a double-lined hood with a colour-matched drawcord.
